abstract: Sets the menu indicator visibility for controls within this view.

declaration.code: nonisolated func menuIndicator(_ visibility: Visibility) -> some View

overview:
## Discussion

Use this modifier to override the default menu indicator visibility for controls in this view. For example, the code below creates a menu without an indicator:

items.description: The menu indicator visibility to apply to controls within a view.
items.name: menuIndicatorVisibility

title: menuIndicator(_:)
